review: I purchased the Amazon Fire TV for my father for a Christmas present.  I needed something that was simple for him to use.  It was incredibly simple to set up. Once I set it up for him, the first thing he tried after getting on prime  instant video, was the remote that has voice activation.  What a brilliant solution to put on a remote for those that are not technology savvy.  He said "Frank Sinatra" and wham o, all of Frankies movies appeared! My father said, "well I'll be damned, look at that"!  It's the small things in life that delight us.  That certainly delighted my father, as it did for me to see his reaction. It was such a joy to see him so pleased with himself.  My father mentioned that he thinks there are a few of Frankies  movies he hasn't seen yet.The whole Fire TV package is simple to use and worth every penny.  I am not a wiz with technology, but I could set this up and move about on the screen with no problem.  I set up Netflix with no trouble at all.  The fire TV plenty of apps to choose from.  I wanted something that would give him both Amazon prime instant video and Netflix.  This was the whole package.  I purchased it on black Friday for $69.  I doubt it will be that price rangeanytime soon.To bad, I would buy one for myself! I realize that this review is not giving the techy stuff that some of looking for.  I simply don't have those skills, but for the novice, I hope this helps you out.
author: precious pup "P.p"
